short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: a simple and light weight QR code generator and tabs sender

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The first this you would ask is how can I use QR code in daily life? Well That's easy

>For sending greeting cards.
>For marketing purposes.
>Payments.
>Can be used widely in education sector.
>Product Packaging.
>Make a coupon for your product.
>Share a link over phone.

and so on....

All these and that Too in a "SECURE" and "LITE" way.
by "LITE" we mean that the size of the QR code is unbelievably small as compared to 
the original data.
Our service uses HTTPS(secure) and "goqr API" service to generate QR codes.

If any bug or problem is faced the users are requested to immediate report so that 
we can fix it as soon as possible. Your feedback is very important to us and helps
us to improve.

*************************************************************************
future updates:
*************************************************************************

*note : we don't save any of your data or QR codes.*
